name: 997c7774-62b8-4627-8780-3f186b7da4c1
goal: Help customer purchase grocery to host a party

steps.text: Help the customer choose a welcome drink, main course and desserts for the party - one category at a time.
For each category, check if the customer already has a choice in mind.
If so, add it to the menu list
If not, present choices 3 at a time and more if needed. Once selected please update the menu list.
After all selections, present the summarized list.
